Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: Golden Dolphin Way extends east and west, parallel to the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The omnimous City Walls lie directly to the south of you. They must be nearly ten meters high, if not more. The walls were built ages ago and have proved their worth many times. In addition to keeping invaders out, they have also been proven to keep thieves and other vermin in, making them easier to capture. It is almost impossible to scale the City Wall from either side.
